bibl.title: with contributions by Bruce E. NIELSEN and Irene SOTO, Greek, Aramaic, and Coptic Gravestones from the Pyramid Complex of Senwosret III at Dahshur.
bibl.note: Introduction (1. The archaeological context; - 2. Dating; - 3. Some characteristics of the gravestones; - 4. Observations on script and language). - Texts from the Metropolitan Museum of Art Excavations (1. Inscription from the Phase 3 Cemetery; - 2-70. Inscriptions from the Early Roman (Phase 4) Cemetery; - 71-104. Inscriptions from the Late Antique Cemetery; - 105-108. Inscriptions of Uncertain Date). - Concordance with Previous Publication Numbers. - Concordance between Inventory and Publication Numbers.
